wowAPI.locale.markdownDescription: Sets the GlobalStrings locale for code completion and hover tooltips.

wowAPI.luals.configurationScope.markdownDescription: The configuration scope for automatically configured [LuaLS settings](https://github.com/Ketho/vscode-wow-api/wiki/Settings#configuration-scope).
enumDescriptions: Settings that apply globally to any instance of VS Code you open.
